Class Manager

java.lang.Object
User
CanBeResearcher
Employee
Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<User>, ResearcherM
public class Manager extends Employee implements Serializable
The Manager class represents a manager in the system

  • Constructor Details

    • Manager

      public Manager(String ID, String password)
      Constructs a Manager object with the specified ID and password.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique identifier for the manager.
      password - The password associated with the manager's account.

  • Method Details

    • report

      public String report(int semester, String subject)
      Generates a report for the specified semester and subject, displaying the average mark for each mark type.
      Parameters:
      semester - The semester for which the report is generated.
      subject - The subject for which the report is generated.
      Returns:
      A report displaying the average mark for each mark type.

    • assignCourseTeacher

      public void assignCourseTeacher(String ID)
      Assigns a teacher to a course based on the teacher's ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the teacher to be assigned to the course.

    • approveStudentRegistration

      public void approveStudentRegistration(String ID)
      Approves student registration for a course based on the student's ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the student whose registration is approved.

    • addCourseForRegistration

      public void addCourseForRegistration(String courseName, int lecturenum, int practicenum, String subject, String description, Elective elective)
      Adds a new course to the system for student registration.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      lecturenum - The number of lectures for the course.
      practicenum - The number of practical sessions for the course.
      subject - The subject of the course.
      description - The description of the course.
      elective - The elective status of the course.

    • getManageTeacher

      public void getManageTeacher(String courseName, String TeacherId)
      Adds a teacher-course pair to the manager's queue for further processing.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.

    • getManageStudent

      public void getManageStudent(String courseName, String StudentID)
      Adds a student-course pair to the manager's queue for further processing.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      studentId - The ID of the student.

      public String viewStudentQueue()
      Displays the student registration queue.
      Returns:

      public String viewTeachersAndCourses()

      Returns:

    • assignLessonToTeacher

      public void assignLessonToTeacher(String subject, LessonType lessonType, String time, int room, String IDofTeacher)
      Assigns a lesson to a teacher.
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject of the lesson.
      lessonType - The type of the lesson (lecture or practice).
      time - The time of the lesson.
      room - The room number of the lesson.
      IDofTeacher - The ID of the teacher to whom the lesson is assigned.

    • removeTeacherLesson

      public void removeTeacherLesson(Lesson lesson, String IDofTeacher)
      Removes a lesson from a teacher's schedule.
      Parameters:
      lesson - The lesson to be removed.
      IDofTeacher - The ID of the teacher from whose schedule the lesson is removed.

    • viewInfoAboutTeachersStudent

      Parameters:
      IDofTeacher - The ID of the teacher.
      IDofStudent - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the information about the student.

      IDofStudent - The ID of the student.
      subject - The subject of the lesson.
      lessonType - The type of the lesson (lecture or practice).
